content.rendered:
Eddie is forced to live with the evil Venom that is a parasite in his body. And he begins to love that there is a super-powered monster inside. He also needs it: because he has to face a stronger, more evil being than him, whom no one wants to keep on a short leash.

Directed By Andy Serkis

Written By Kelly Marcel. Tom Hardy

Stars: Tom Hardy. Woody Harrelson. Michelle Williams
